credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Fork
description: Two long diverging tines, round shouldered. Shaped bolster. Continuous tang, exposed at sides, handle rectangular in section, curved beak end. Two cast brass scales, each with two panels of scrollwork, alternately with crudely engraved sections. Two rivets through scales and tang.
name: Fork
